adv402.t$cdom = adv401.t$cdom and adv402.t$cust = adv401.t$cust and adv402.t$ctnm = adv401.t$ctnm where adv401.t$cpac = 'wh' and adv401.t$cdom = 'col.stat' and adv401.t$cust = 'usa1' and adv402.t$clan = '2')t2 on t1.STAT = t2.t$cnst) ConGlobal1 LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} cibd001 on cibd001.T$ITEM = ConGlobal1.ITEM LEFT JOIN {0}.tticst002{1} icst002 on icst002.T$PDNO = ConGlobal1.ORNO UNION select TBL, PAID, CWAR, LOCA, ITEM, QTYC, CUNI, STAT, T$EDES as STATD,ORNO,T$DSCA AS DSCA,icst002.T$MCNO,LOGN,T$DATE from (select * from ( SELECT 'ticol022' AS TBL,ticol022.T$SQNB AS PAID,ticol222.T$CWAT AS CWAR,ticol222.T$ACLO AS LOCA,ticol022.T$MITM AS ITEM,ticol222.T$ACQT AS qtyc, ticol022.T$CUNI AS CUNI,ticol022.T$DELE AS STAT,ticol022.T$PDNO AS ORNO,T$LOGN LOGN, T$DATE FROM {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 INNER JOIN {0}.tticol222{1} ticol222 ON ticol222.T$SQNB = ticol022.T$SQNB WHERE ticol022.T$DELE in (4,5,7) UNION SELECT 'ticol042' AS TBL,ticol042.T$SQNB AS PAID,ticol242.T$CWAT AS CWAR,ticol242.T$ACLO AS LOCA,ticol042.T$MITM AS ITEM,ticol242.T$ACQT AS qtyc, ticol042.T$CUNI AS CUNI,ticol042.T$DELE AS STAT,ticol042.T$PDNO AS ORNO,T$LOGN LOGN, T$DATE FROM {0}.tticol042{1} ticol042 INNER JOIN {0}.tticol242{1} ticol242 ON ticol242.T$SQNB = ticol042.T$SQNB WHERE ticol042.T$DELE in (4,5,7) ) t1 LEFT JOIN (select adv401.t$cnst, adv402.t$edes from {0}.tttadv401000 adv401 inner join {0}.tttadv402000 adv402 on adv402.t$cpac = adv401.t$cpac and adv402.t$cdom = adv401.t$cdom and adv402.t$cust = adv401.t$cust and adv402.t$ctnm = adv401.t$ctnm where adv401.t$cpac = 'ti' and adv401.t$cdom = 'col.deje' and adv401.t$cust = 'usa1' and adv402.t$clan = '2') t2 on t1.STAT = t2.t$cnst) ConGlobal2 LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} cibd001 on cibd001.T$ITEM = ConGlobal2.ITEM LEFT JOIN {0}.tticst002{1} icst002 on icst002.T$PDNO = ConGlobal2.ORNO )where TO_CHAR(T$DATE,'YYYYMMDD') > TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('20200101','YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') and rownum < 240

operationName.stringSQL: SELECT distinct TBL,PAID,QTYT,UNIT,ITEM,cibd001.t$dsca DSCA, ORNO,STAT,CWAT,ACLO,mcs003.T$DSCA DESCAW FROM ( select 'ticol022' AS TBL, col022.T$SQNB AS PAID,col222.T$ACQT AS QTYT,col022.T$CUNI AS UNIT, col022.T$MITM AS ITEM,col022.T$PDNO AS ORNO, col022.T$DELE AS STAT,col222.T$CWAT AS CWAT ,col222.T$ACLO AS ACLO from {0}.tticol022{1} col022 INNER JOIN baan.tticol222140 col222 on col222.t$sqnb = col022.t$sqnb UNION select 'ticol042' AS TBL, col042.T$SQNB AS PAID,col242.T$ACQT AS QTYT,col042.T$CUNI AS UNIT, col042.T$MITM AS ITEM,col042.T$PDNO AS ORNO, col042.T$DELE AS STAT,col242.T$CWAT,col242.T$ACLO from {0}.tticol042{1} col042 INNER JOIN baan.tticol242140 col242 on col242.t$sqnb = col042.t$sqnb UNION select 'whcol131' AS TBL,T$PAID AS PAID,T$QTYA AS QTYT,T$UNIT AS UNIT,T$ITEM AS ITEM, T$ORNO AS ORNO, T$STAT AS STAT,T$CWAA,T$LOAA from {0}.twhcol131{1} col131 ) ConGlobal LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} cibd001 on cibd001.T$ITEM = ConGlobal.ITEM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} mcs003 on ConGlobal.CWAT = mcs003.t$cwar WHERE TRIM(ConGlobal.PAID) = TRIM('[:PAID]')

operationName.name: VerificarPalletIDz
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT distinct TBL,PAID,QTYT,UNIT,ITEM,cibd001.t$dsca DSCA, ORNO,STAT,CWAT,ACLO,mcs003.T$DSCA DESCAW,whwmd200.T$sloc SLOC FROM ( select 'ticol022' AS TBL, col022.T$SQNB AS PAID,col222.T$ACQT AS QTYT,col022.T$CUNI AS UNIT, col022.T$MITM AS ITEM,col022.T$PDNO AS ORNO, col022.T$DELE AS STAT,col222.T$CWAT AS CWAT ,col222.T$ACLO AS ACLO from baan.tticol022140 col022 INNER JOIN baan.tticol222140 col222 on col222.t$sqnb = col022.t$sqnb where col022.T$DELE = 7 UNION select 'ticol042' AS TBL, col042.T$SQNB AS PAID,col242.T$ACQT AS QTYT,col042.T$CUNI AS UNIT, col042.T$MITM AS ITEM,col042.T$PDNO AS ORNO, col042.T$DELE AS STAT,col242.T$CWAT,col242.T$ACLO from baan.tticol042140 col042 INNER JOIN baan.tticol242140 col242 on col242.t$sqnb = col042.t$sqnb where col042.T$DELE = 7 UNION select 'whcol131' AS TBL,T$PAID AS PAID,T$QTYA AS QTYT,T$UNIT AS UNIT,T$ITEM AS ITEM, T$ORNO AS ORNO, T$STAT AS STAT,T$CWAA,T$LOAA from baan.twhcol131140 col131 where col131.T$STAT = 3 ) ConGlobal LEFT JOIN baan.ttcibd001140 cibd001 on cibd001.T$ITEM = ConGlobal.ITEM LEFT JOIN baan.ttcmcs003140 mcs003 on ConGlobal.CWAT = mcs003.t$cwar LEFT JOIN baan.twhwmd200140 whwmd200 ON ConGlobal.CWAT = whwmd200.T$CWAR WHERE TRIM(ConGlobal.PAID) = TRIM('[:PAID]')

operationName.name: ConsultaUnidadesMedida
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT trim(T$CUNI) CUNI, T$DSCA DSCA FROM {0}.ttcmcs001{1} where T$TCCU != 6

operationName.name: ConsultaNOOrdencompra
operationName.stringSQL: select distinct TCIBD001.T$KLTC KLTC,WHINH210.t$clot, WHINH210.t$qstr ,WHINH210.t$orno, WHINH210.t$item, TCIBD001.T$DSCA, WHINH210.t$pono, WHINH210.t$seqn, WHINH210.t$cwar, WHINH210.t$prdt from {0}.twhinh210{1} WHINH210 INNER JOIN {0}.TTCIBD001{1} TCIBD001 on WHINH210.T$ITEM = TCIBD001.T$ITEM where trim(WHINH210.t$orno) = '[:T$ORNO]' and trim(WHINH210.t$item) = '[:T$ITEM]' and trim(WHINH210.t$pono) = '[:T$PONO]' and trim(WHINH210.t$oorg) ='[:T$OORG]' /*and WHINH210.t$clot = '[:T$CLOT]'*/ and WHINH210.t$qstr >= '[:T$CANT]' and WHINH210.t$lsta = 5 and WHINH210.t$blck = 2 order by WHINH210.t$prdt asc

operationName.name: vallidatePurchaseOrder
operationName.stringSQL: select pur401.t$orno "ret_order", pur401.t$pono "position", pur401.t$sqnb "secuence",pur401.t$oqua "order_qty", pur401.t$bqua "pending_qty", pur401.t$item "item",ibd001.T$dsca "description", pur401.t$ddtb "date_pl_receive", inh220.t$oset "set", ipu001.t$rtdp "datetol_max", ipu001.t$rtdm "datetol_min", ipu001.t$rtqp "qtytol_max",ipu001.t$rtqm "qtytol_min", pur401.t$oltp "type", pur401.t$cwar "warehouse",inh220.t$seqn "secuence", inh220.t$clot "lot", ibd001.t$cuni "unit",pur400.t$cotp "currency", pur401.t$otbp "supplier", com100.t$nama "name",inh220.t$qstr "qstr",inh220.T$STUN STUN from {0}.ttdpur401{1} pur401 inner join {0}.ttdipu001{1} ipu001 on ipu001.t$item = pur401.t$item inner join {0}.twhinh220{1} inh220 on inh220.t$orno = pur401.t$orno and inh220.t$pono = pur401.t$pono inner join {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 on ibd001.t$item = pur401.t$item inner join {0}.ttdpur400{1} pur400 on pur400.t$orno = pur401.t$orno inner join {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 on pur400.t$otbp = com100.t$bpid where pur401.t$oltp != 3 and pur401.t$orno ='[p1]' and inh220.t$lsta = 5 and inh220.t$blck = 2 order by pur401.t$orno, pur401.t$pono, pur401.t$ddtb

operationName.name: vallidatePurchaseOrderWithPosition
operationName.stringSQL: select pur401.t$item "item", pur401.t$cwar "warehouse",inh220.t$qstr "qstr" from {0}.ttdpur401{1} pur401 inner join {0}.ttdipu001{1} ipu001 on ipu001.t$item = pur401.t$item inner join {0}.twhinh220{1} inh220 on inh220.t$orno = pur401.t$orno and inh220.t$pono = pur401.t$pono inner join {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 on ibd001.t$item = pur401.t$item inner join {0}.ttdpur400{1} pur400 on pur400.t$orno = pur401.t$orno inner join {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 on pur400.t$otbp = com100.t$bpid where pur401.t$oltp != 3 and pur401.t$orno ='[p1]' and pur401.t$pono =[p2] and inh220.t$lsta = 5 and inh220.t$blck = 2 order by pur401.t$orno, pur401.t$pono, pur401.t$ddtb

operationName.name: ConsultaOrdencompra
operationName.stringSQL: select pur401.t$orno, pur401.t$pono, pur401.t$sqnb, pur401.t$oqua, pur401.t$bqua, pur401.t$item, ibd001.T$dsca dsca, pur401.t$ddtb, inh210.t$oset, ipu001.t$rtdp, ipu001.t$rtdm, ipu001.t$rtqp, ipu001.t$rtqm, pur401.t$oltp, pur401.t$cwar,inh210.t$seqn T$SQNBR, pur400.t$cotp from {0}.ttdpur401{1} pur401 inner join {0}.ttdipu001{1} ipu001 on ipu001.t$item = pur401.t$item inner join {0}.twhinh210{1} inh210 on inh210.t$orno = pur401.t$orno and inh210.t$pono = pur401.t$pono --and inh210.t$seqn/100000 = pur401.t$sqnb inner join {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 on ibd001.t$item = pur401.t$item inner join {0}.ttdpur400{1} pur400 on pur400.t$orno = pur401.t$orno --where TO_CHAR(inh210.t$prdt,'YYYYMMDD') between TO_CHAR(sysdate-ipu001.t$rtdp,'YYYYMMDD') and TO_CHAR(sysdate+ipu001.t$rtdm,'YYYYMMDD') -- Tolerancia en dias atras y adelante where pur401.t$oltp != 3 --No tomar retroordenes --*/and pur401.t$bqua = 0 --No tomo lineas que tenga retroorden and pur401.t$orno = '[:T$ORNO]' --Orden que esten digitando and pur401.t$pono = '[:T$PONO]'--Posicion que esten digitando. --and 1500 between 0 /*(pur401.t$oqua * (1 - ipu001.t$rtqp/100))*/ and (pur401.t$oqua * (1 + ipu001.t$rtqp/100)) --Cantidad escaneada con tolerancia - o + --and pur401.t$item like '%[:T$ITEM]%' --Item escaneado --and pur401.t$clot = 'JG' --Lote escaneado and inh210.t$lsta = 5 --Linea en estado abierto en la orden de almacenaje and inh210.t$blck = 2 order by pur401.t$orno, pur401.t$pono, pur401.t$ddtb

operationName.name: ConsultaOrdenImportacion

operationName.name: FactorConvercionMul

operationName.name: InsertarReseiptRawMaterial
operationName.stringSQL: insert into {0}.twhcol130{1} (T$OORG, T$ORNO, T$ITEM, T$PAID, T$PONO, T$SEQN, T$CLOT, T$CWAR, T$QTYS, T$UNIT, T$QTYC, T$UNIC, T$DATE, T$CONF, T$RCNO, T$DATR, T$LOCA, T$DATL, T$PRNT, T$DATP, T$NPRT, T$LOGN, T$LOGT, T$STAT,/*CAMPOS EXCLUIDOS DEL ENVIO DE INFORMAION(NO PUEDEN SER NULOS )*/ T$PICK,T$DATK,T$LOGP,T$DAFR,T$MES1,T$DAFL,T$MES2,T$REFCNTD,T$REFCNTU,T$CWAA,T$DRPT,T$FIRE,T$LOAA,T$LOGR,T$QTYA,T$PSNO,T$ALLO) values ( '[:T$OORG]', /* T$OORG */ /* '2' */ '[:T$ORNO]', /* T$ORNO */ /* 'OPN028526' */ '[:T$ITEM]', /* T$ITEM */ /* 'BPBUG-00000' */ '[:T$PAID]', /* T$PAID */ /* 'OPN028526-023' */ '[:T$PONO]', /* T$PONO */ /* '2' */ '[:T$SEQN]', /* T$SEQN */ /* '1' */ '[:T$CLOT]', /* T$CLOT */ /* 'JH' */ '[:T$CWAR]', /* T$CWAR */ /* 'WRV101' */ '[:T$QTYS]', /* T$QTYS */ /* '250000' */ '[:T$UNIT]', /* T$UNIT */ /* 'UN' */ '[:T$QTYC]', /* T$QTYC */ /* '250000' */ '[:T$UNIC]', /* T$UNIC */ /* 'UN' */ sysdate+5/24, /*[:T$DATE]', /* T$DATE */ /* '25/09/19' */ '[:T$CONF]', /* T$CONF */ /* '1' */ '[:T$RCNO]', /* T$RCNO */ /* '013950974' */ sysdate+5/24, /* T$DATR */ /* '01/01/70' */ '[:T$LOCA]', /*T$LOCA */ /* '[:T$LOCA]' */ sysdate+5/24,/*'[:T$DATL]', T$DATL */ /* '01/01/70' */ '[:T$PRNT]', /* T$PRNT */ /* '2' */ sysdate+5/24, /*'[:T$DATP]', T$DATP */ /* '19/09/19' */ '[:T$NPRT]', /* T$NPRT */ /* '0' */ '[:T$LOGN]', /* T$LOGN */ /* 'JCASTRO' */ '[:T$LOGT]', /* T$LOGT */ /* '[:T$LOGT]' */ '[:T$STAT]', /* T$STAT */ /* '1' */ /*CAMPOS EXCLUIDOS DEL ENVIO DE INFORMAION(NO PUEDEN SER NULOS )*/'0',sysdate+5/24,' ',sysdate+5/24,' ',sysdate+5/24,' ','0','0',' ',sysdate,'[:T$FIRE]',' ',' ',0,'[:T$PSNO]','[:T$ALLO]')

operationName.name: ListaPurchaseOrders
operationName.stringSQL: select TO_CHAR(inh210.t$prdt,'MM/DD/YYYY') PRDT,ipu001.t$rtdp RTDP,ipu001.t$rtdm RTDM,CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(inh210.t$prdt,'YYYYMMDD') between TO_CHAR(sysdate-ipu001.t$rtdp,'YYYYMMDD') and TO_CHAR(sysdate+ipu001.t$rtdm,'YYYYMMDD') THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS TERM,pur401.t$orno ORNO, pur401.t$pono PONO, pur401.t$sqnb SQNB, pur401.t$oqua OQUA, pur401.t$bqua BQUA, pur401.t$item ITEM, IBD001.t$dsca dsca, IBD001.T$KLTC KLTC, pur401.t$ddtb DDTB, inh210.t$oset OSET, ipu001.t$rtdp RTDP, ipu001.t$rtdm RTDM, ipu001.t$rtqp RTQP, ipu001.t$rtqm RTQM, pur401.t$oltp OLTP, pur401.t$cwar CWAR,inh210.T$STUN STUN, IBD001.T$CUNI CUNI,inh210.t$seqn SEQNR,inh210.T$QSTR QSTR from {0}.ttdpur401{1} pur401 inner join {0}.ttdipu001{1} ipu001 on ipu001.t$item = pur401.t$item inner join {0}.twhinh210{1} inh210 on inh210.t$orno = pur401.t$orno and inh210.t$pono = pur401.t$pono/* and inh210.t$seqn/100000 = pur401.t$sqnb*/ INNER JOIN {0}.TTCIBD001{1} IBD001 on pur401.T$ITEM = IBD001.T$ITEM where /*TO_CHAR(pur401.t$ddtb,'MM/DD/YYYY') between TO_CHAR(sysdate-ipu001.t$rtdp,'MM/DD/YYYY') and TO_CHAR(sysdate+ipu001.t$rtdm,'MM/DD/YYYY') -- Tolerancia en dias atras y adelante and */ pur401.t$oltp != 3 --No tomar retroordenes /*and pur401.t$bqua = 0 --No tomo lineas que tenga retroorden*/ /*and pur401.t$orno = ('OPN024439') --Orden que esten digitando*/ /*and pur401.t$pono = --Posicion que esten digitando.*/ /*and pur401.t$oqua between -(CAMPO CANT * (-1 + ipu001.t$rtqp/100)) and (CAMPO CANT * (1 + ipu001.t$rtqp/100)) --Cantidad escaneada con tolerancia - o +*/ /*and pur401.t$item like '%BRPCW-00009%' --Item escaneado*/ /*and pur401.t$clot = ' ' --Lote escaneado and */ and inh210.t$lsta = 5 --Linea en estado abierto en la orden de almacenaje and inh210.t$blck = 2 order by pur401.t$orno, pur401.t$pono, pur401.t$ddtb

operationName.stringSQL: select TBL, ITEM, SUM(QTYC) QTYC, CUNI, STAT,ORNO from ( SELECT 'whcol131' AS TBL,T$PAID AS PAID,T$CWAA AS CWAR,T$LOAA AS LOCA,T$ITEM AS ITEM,SUM(T$QTYA) AS qtyc,T$UNIC AS CUNI,T$STAT AS STAT,T$ORNO AS ORNO,T$LOGN LOGN, T$DATE FROM baan.tWhcol131140 WHERE T$STAT = 6 group by T$PAID,T$CWAA,T$LOAA,T$ITEM,T$UNIC,T$STAT,T$ORNO,T$LOGN, T$DATE UNION SELECT 'ticol042' AS TBL,ticol042.T$SQNB AS PAID,ticol242.T$CWAT AS CWAR,ticol242.T$ACLO AS LOCA,ticol042.T$MITM AS ITEM,SUM(ticol242.T$ACQT) AS qtyc, ticol042.T$CUNI AS CUNI,ticol042.T$DELE AS STAT,ticol042.T$PDNO AS ORNO,T$LOGN LOGN, T$DATE FROM baan.tticol042140 ticol042 INNER JOIN baan.tticol242140 ticol242 ON ticol242.T$SQNB = ticol042.T$SQNB WHERE ticol042.T$DELE = 8 group by ticol042.T$SQNB,T$CWAT,T$ACLO,T$MITM,T$CUNI,T$DELE,ticol042.T$PDNO,T$LOGN,T$DATE UNION SELECT 'ticol022' AS TBL,ticol022.T$SQNB AS PAID,ticol222.T$CWAT AS CWAR,ticol222.T$ACLO AS LOCA,ticol022.T$MITM AS ITEM,SUM(ticol222.T$ACQT) AS qtyc, ticol022.T$CUNI AS CUNI,ticol022.T$DELE AS STAT,ticol022.T$PDNO AS ORNO,T$LOGN LOGN, T$DATE FROM baan.tticol022140 ticol022 INNER JOIN baan.tticol222140 ticol222 ON ticol222.T$SQNB = ticol022.T$SQNB WHERE ticol022.T$DELE = 8 group by ticol022.T$SQNB,T$CWAT,T$ACLO,T$MITM,T$CUNI,T$DELE,ticol022.T$PDNO,T$LOGN,T$DATE ) where trim(ITEM) = trim('[:T$ITEM]') GROUP BY TBL, ITEM, CUNI, STAT,ORNO

operationName.name: listaRegistrosItems
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((sfc001.t$qrdr) *(1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW)))) ELSE sfc001.t$qrdr END AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 0) ELSE 1 END Filter4, REPLACE(TRUNC(CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch END ELSE col020.t$camo END, 8), ',', '.') AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, ibd003.T$CONV, T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte * (1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))) / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS RunspeedExpected, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte * (1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))) / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS JobMaxRunRate, REPLACE(TRUNC((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 8), ',', '.') AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ibd003 ON ibd003.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = ibd003.t$item AND ibd003.t$unit = 'UN' INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.name: listaRegistrosItems
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((sfc001.t$qrdr)) ELSE sfc001.t$qrdr END AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, 1 AS Filter4, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch * col020.t$nuti END ELSE col020.t$camo END) / 1000, 8), ',', '.') AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, 1 AS T$CONV, 1 AS T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS RunspeedExpected, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS JobMaxRunRate, 1 AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.name: listaRegistrosItemsUSA
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, sfc001.t$qrdr AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 0) ELSE 1 END Filter4, REPLACE(TRUNC( CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch END ELSE col020.t$camo END / CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 0) ELSE 1 END, 8), ',', '.') AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, ibd003.T$CONV, T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, rou102.t$exin AS RunspeedExpected, rou102.t$exin AS JobMaxRunRate, REPLACE(TRUNC((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 8), ',', '.') AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ibd003 ON ibd003.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = ibd003.t$item AND ibd003.t$unit = 'UN' INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid INNER JOIN {0}.ttirou102{1} rou102 ON rou102.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND rou102.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.stringSQL: SELECT distinct TBL,PAID,QTYT,UNIT,ITEM,cibd001.t$dsca DSCA, ORNO,STAT,CWAT,ACLO,mcs003.T$DSCA DESCAW FROM ( select 'ticol022' AS TBL, col022.T$SQNB AS PAID,col222.T$ACQT AS QTYT,col022.T$CUNI AS UNIT, col022.T$MITM AS ITEM,col022.T$PDNO AS ORNO, col022.T$DELE AS STAT,col222.T$CWAT AS CWAT ,col222.T$ACLO AS ACLO from {0}.tticol022{1} col022 INNER JOIN {0}.tticol222{1} col222 on col222.t$sqnb = col022.t$sqnb WHERE col022.T$DELE ='7' UNION select 'ticol042' AS TBL, col042.T$SQNB AS PAID,col242.T$ACQT AS QTYT,col042.T$CUNI AS UNIT, col042.T$MITM AS ITEM,col042.T$PDNO AS ORNO, col042.T$DELE AS STAT,col242.T$CWAT,col242.T$ACLO from {0}.tticol042{1} col042 INNER JOIN {0}.tticol242{1} col242 on col242.t$sqnb = col042.t$sqnb WHERE col042.T$DELE ='7' UNION select 'whcol131' AS TBL,T$PAID AS PAID,T$QTYA AS QTYT,T$UNIT AS UNIT,T$ITEM AS ITEM, T$ORNO AS ORNO, T$STAT AS STAT,T$CWAA,T$LOAA from {0}.twhcol131{1} col131 WHERE T$STAT ='3' UNION select 'whcol130' AS TBL,T$PAID AS PAID,T$QTYA AS QTYT,T$UNIT AS UNIT,T$ITEM AS ITEM, T$ORNO AS ORNO, T$STAT AS STAT,T$CWAA,T$LOAA from {0}.twhcol130{1} col130 WHERE T$STAT ='3' ) ConGlobal LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} cibd001 on cibd001.T$ITEM = ConGlobal.ITEM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttccol307{1} col307 on ConGlobal.PAID = col307.T$PAID LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} mcs003 on ConGlobal.CWAT = mcs003.t$cwar WHERE TRIM(ConGlobal.PAID) = TRIM('[:PAID]') AND col307.T$PAID IS NULL

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberSugUbicacionConOrigen
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT * FROM( SELECT inh210.T$ORNO AS PDNO, TRIM(inh210.T$ITEM) AS MITM, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, nvl((SELECT SUM(T$RSTK) FROM {0}.twhinh210{1} WHERE T$OORG= '[:T$OORG]' AND T$LOCA='INS'),0) STPND, col124.T$QTDT AS QTDL, col124.T$DAFS AS DAFS, col120.T$WHTA AS WHTA, col120.T$SHPO AS SHPO FROM {2} col124 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col124.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.twhinh210{1} inh210 on inh210.t$oorg = '[:T$OORG]' and inh210.t$orno = col120.t$shpo and inh210.t$cwar = col120.t$whta and inh210.t$item = col124.t$item and inh210.t$clot = col124.t$clot and inh210.t$rstk not in 0 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = inh210.T$ITEM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} tcibd003 on tcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM and tcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI and tcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE col124.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]' AND col124.T$LOCS = 2 UNION SELECT inh210.T$ORNO AS PDNO, TRIM(inh210.T$ITEM) AS MITM, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, nvl((SELECT SUM(T$RSTK) FROM {0}.twhinh210{1} WHERE T$OORG= '[:T$OORG]' AND T$LOCA='INS'),0) STPND, col125.T$QTDT AS QTDL, col125.T$DAFS AS DAFS, col120.T$WHTA AS WHTA, col120.T$SHPO AS SHPO FROM {0}.twhcol125{1} col125 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col125.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.twhinh210{1} inh210 on inh210.t$oorg = '[:T$OORG]' and inh210.t$orno = col120.t$shpo and inh210.t$cwar = col120.t$whta and inh210.t$item = col125.t$item and inh210.t$clot = col125.t$clot and inh210.t$rstk not in 0 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = inh210.T$ITEM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} tcibd003 on tcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM and tcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI and tcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE col125.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]' AND col125.T$LOCS = 2) ORDER BY DAFS DESC

operationName.name: findBySqnbPdnoNoClot
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col124.T$PAID AS PDNO, col124.T$ITEM AS MITM, col120.T$WHTA AS CWAR, col124.T$CLOT AS CLOT, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, col124.T$QTDT Qty, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=col124.T$ITEM) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol032.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol032{1} ticol032 WHERE ticol032.T$ORNO=substr(col124.T$PAID,0,9)) Qtypend FROM {2} col124 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col124.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = col124.t$item WHERE col124.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]' UNION SELECT col125.T$PAID AS PDNO, col125.T$ITEM AS MITM, col120.T$WHTA AS CWAR, col125.T$CLOT AS CLOT, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, col125.T$QTDT Qty, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=col124.T$ITEM) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol032.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol032{1} ticol032 WHERE ticol032.T$ORNO=substr(col125.T$PAID,0,9)) Qtypend FROM {0}.twhcol125{1} col125 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col125.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = col125.t$item WHERE col125.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findBySqnbPdnoYesClot
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col124.T$PAID AS PDNO, col124.T$ITEM AS MITM, col120.T$WHTA AS CWAR, col124.T$CLOT AS CLOT, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, col124.T$QTDT QTY, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=col124.T$ITEM AND twhinr140.T$CLOT=col124.T$CLOT) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol032.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol032{1} ticol032 WHERE ticol032.T$ORNO=substr(col124.T$PAID,0,9)) QTYPEND FROM {2} col124 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col124.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = col124.t$item WHERE col124.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]' UNION SELECT col125.T$PAID AS PDNO, col125.T$ITEM AS MITM, col120.T$WHTA AS CWAR, col125.T$CLOT AS CLOT, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, col125.T$QTDT QTY, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=col125.T$ITEM AND twhinr140.T$CLOT=col125.T$CLOT) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol032.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol032{1} ticol032 WHERE ticol032.T$ORNO=substr(col125.T$PAID,0,9)) QTYPEND FROM {0}.twhcol125{1} col125 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col125.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = col125.t$item WHERE col125.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$SZSM AS SZSM FROM {2} WHERE T$BPID = '[:T$STBP]' AND [:T$TAMLOTE] >= T$QTYS AND [:T$TAMLOTE] <= T$QTYE

operationName.name: findProdValidation_Parameter
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$PRVL PRVL FROM {2}

operationName.name: GenericProducts_listaRegistroOrden_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT sfc001.ROWID ID, RTRIM(sfc001.t$pdno) orden, TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm) item, TRIM(ibd001.t$dsca) desci, TRIM(T$CUNI) unidad, T$UNIT, ibd003.T$CONV, CASE TRIM(T$UNIT) WHEN 'UN' THEN ROUND(1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))) ELSE T$CONV END FACTOR FROM {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON sfc010.t$pdno = sfc001.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ibd003 ON ibd003.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm WHERE sfc001.t$pdno='[p1]' AND sfc001.t$osta < 8 AND TRIM(T$UNIT) = 'UN' ORDER BY sfc001.t$pdno

operationName.name: findByOrderNumber
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS ITEM, tcibd001.T$DSCA AS DESCRIPCIONITEM, tisfc001.T$CWAR AS BODEGA, tcmcs003.T$DSCA AS DESCRIPCIONBODEGA, tisfc001.T$QRDR AS TOTAL, tisfc001.T$QDLV AS ENTREGADO, tisfc001.T$QRDR - tisfc001.T$QDLV - tisfc001.T$QTDL AS PENDIENTE, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS UNIDAD, tisfc001.T$OSTA AS ESTATUS, tisfc001.T$QTDL AS CANTCONF FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = tisfc001.T$MITM INNER JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} tcmcs003 ON tcmcs003.T$CWAR = tisfc001.T$CWAR WHERE tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberSugUbicacion
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT DISTINCT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, TRIM(tisfc001.T$MITM) AS MITM, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, nvl((SELECT SUM(T$STKT) FROM {0}.twhinh211{1} WHERE T$OORG=4 AND T$LOCA='INS' AND T$ORNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO GROUP BY tisfc001.T$PDNO),0) STPND, ticol022.T$QTDL AS QTDL FROM {2} tisfc001 JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = tisfc001.T$MITM JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND ticol022.T$PRO2 = 2 AND ticol022.T$PRO1 = 1 LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} tcibd003 ON tcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM AND tcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI AND tcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberConfirmRecep
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT ticol022.T$SQNB AS SQNB, tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, rtrim(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$OSTA AS OSTA, tisfc001.T$CWAR CWAR, tcmcs003.T$DSCA DSCACWAR, ticol022.T$QTDL AS QTDL, T$QRDR AS QRDR, tisfc001.T$QTDL - (select nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol025{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM=tisfc001.T$MITM) AS QTYPEND, T$QDLV + (select nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol025{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) AS TOTQTYENT, tcibd003.T$CONV AS QTYPLT, ticol022.T$DELE AS DELE, wmd200.t$sloc as SLOC, (select t$loca from {0}.twhwmd300{1} where t$cwar = tisfc001.T$CWAR and t$loct = 5 and t$prio < 999 and rownum = 1 group by t$loca) as LOCA FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tisfc001.T$MITM = tcibd001.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} tcmcs003 ON tcmcs003.T$CWAR = tisfc001.T$CWAR INNER JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO INNER JOIN {0}.twhwmd200{1} wmd200 on wmd200.t$cwar = tisfc001.T$CWAR LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} tcibd003 ON tcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI AND tcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM AND tcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE ticol022.T$PRO1 = 2 AND ticol022.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]'

operationName.name: findBySqnbPdnoNoClot
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, tisfc001.T$CWAR AS CWAR, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$QRDR - tisfc001.T$QDLV - (SELECT nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol030{1} WHERE T$PDNO=tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM=tisfc001.T$MITM) Qty, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=tisfc001.T$MITM) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol030.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol030{1} ticol030 WHERE ticol030.T$PDNO=tisfc001.T$PDNO) Qtypend FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tisfc001.T$MITM = tcibd001.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO WHERE ticol022.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]' AND ticol022.T$PRO2 = '2'

operationName.name: findBySqnbPdnoYesClot
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, tisfc001.T$CWAR AS CWAR, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$QRDR - tisfc001.T$QDLV - (SELECT nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol030{1} WHERE T$PDNO=tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM=tisfc001.T$MITM) QTY, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$CLOT=tisfc001.T$PDNO AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=tisfc001.T$MITM) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol030.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol030{1} ticol030 WHERE ticol030.T$PDNO=tisfc001.T$PDNO) QTYPEND FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tisfc001.T$MITM = tcibd001.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO WHERE ticol022.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]' AND ticol022.T$PRO2 = '2'

operationName.name: findByPdnoSqnbAndPro1
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT ticol022.T$SQNB AS SQNB,tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, tisfc001.T$QRDR AS QTYORD, tisfc001.T$QTDL + (SELECT nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol025{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) QTYPNDCONF FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO WHERE ticol022.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]' AND ticol022.T$PRO1 = '[:T$PRO1]'

operationName.name: findByPdnoArticulo
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001170.T$MITM AS MITM, tcibd001170.T$DSCA AS DSCA FROM {2} tisfc001170 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001170 ON tcibd001170.T$ITEM = tisfc001170.T$MITM WHERE TRIM(T$PDNO) = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberAnuncioOrd
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT TRIM(tisfc001.T$PDNO) AS PDNO, TRIM(tisfc001.T$MITM) AS MITM, TRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCAITEM, ttcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, tisfc001.T$QRDR AS QRDR, TRIM(tisfc010.T$MCNO) AS MCNO, tisfc001.T$OSTA AS OSTA, tisfc001.T$CWAR AS CWAR, tcmccs003.T$DSCA AS DSCACWAR, tisfc001.T$QRDR - tisfc001.T$QDLV - tisfc001.T$QTDL - (SELECT nvl(SUM(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol020{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) AS QTYPEND, ttcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, tisfc001.T$QRDR AS QRDR, tisfc001.T$QDLV + (SELECT nvl(SUM(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol020{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.t$pdno AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) TOTQTYEND, tisfc001.T$QDLV + tisfc001.T$QTDL + (SELECT nvl(SUM(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol020{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) AS QTYREC, TRIM(tcibd001.T$CUNI) AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$QDLV AS QDLV, (SELECT nvl(SUM(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol022{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$DELE NOT IN ('1','3','13')) AS QTYREH, CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(tccom130.T$NAME), ' - '),tccom130.T$CSTE) AS NAME, NVL((select sum (t$qtdl) from {0}.tticol020{1} where t$pdno='[:T$PDNO]'), 0) QTYANN, col011.t$pdno AS PDN1, col011.t$stat AS STAT FROM {0}.ttisfc001{1} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = tisfc001.T$MITM INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} tisfc010 ON tisfc010.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ttcibd003 ON ttcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI AND ttcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM AND ttcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' INNER JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} tcmccs003 ON tcmccs003.T$CWAR = tisfc001.T$CWAR INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom130{1} tccom130 ON tccom130.T$CADR = tcmccs003.T$CADR LEFT JOIN {0}.tticol020{1} ticol020 ON ticol020.T$PDNO = tisfc010.T$PDNO LEFT JOIN {0}.tticol011{1} col011 on col011.t$pdno = tisfc001.t$pdno WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' GROUP BY tisfc001.T$PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM, tcibd001.T$DSCA, ttcibd003.T$CONV, tisfc001.T$QRDR, tisfc010.T$MCNO, tisfc001.T$OSTA, tisfc001.T$CWAR, tcmccs003.T$DSCA, tisfc001.T$QRDR, tisfc001.T$QDLV, tisfc001.T$QTDL, tisfc001.T$QRDR, tcibd001.T$CUNI, CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(tccom130.T$NAME), ' - '),tccom130.T$CSTE), col011.t$pdno, col011.t$stat

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberPalletTags
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT TRIM(tisfc001.T$PDNO) AS PDNO, TRIM(tisfc001.T$MITM) AS MITM, TRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, ttcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, tisfc001.T$QRDR AS QRDR, TRIM(tisfc010.T$MCNO) AS MCNO, TRIM(tcibd001.T$CUNI) AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$QDLV AS QDLV,ticol011.T$STAT STAT, CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(tccom130.T$NAME), ' - '),tccom130.T$CSTE) AS NAME, tisfc001.t$qtdl QTYPCONF, NVL((select sum (t$qtdl) from {0}.tticol020{1} where t$pdno='[:T$PDNO]'), 0) QTYANN, NVL((select sum (t$qtdl) from {0}.tticol022{1} where t$pdno='[:T$PDNO]' and t$dele in ('1','3','13')), 0) QTYREH FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = tisfc001.T$MITM INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} tisfc010 ON tisfc010.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ttcibd003 ON ttcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI AND ttcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM AND ttcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' INNER JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} tcmccs003 ON tcmccs003.T$CWAR = tisfc001.T$CWAR INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom130{1} tccom130 ON tccom130.T$CADR = tcmccs003.T$CADR LEFT JOIN {0}.tticol020{1} ticol020 ON ticol020.T$PDNO = tisfc010.T$PDNO LEFT JOIN {0}.tticol011{1} ticol011 ON ticol011.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' GROUP BY tisfc001.T$PDNO,tisfc001.T$MITM,tcibd001.T$DSCA,ttcibd003.T$CONV, tisfc001.T$QRDR,tisfc010.T$MCNO,tcibd001.T$CUNI,tisfc001.T$QDLV,ticol011.T$STAT, CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(tccom130.T$NAME), ' - '),tccom130.T$CSTE), tisfc001.t$qtdl

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberTime
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, tcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA, tisfc010.T$OPNO AS OPNO, tisfc010.T$TANO AS TANO, tirou003.T$DSCA AS DSCAOP, tisfc010.T$MCNO AS MCNO FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = tisfc001.T$MITM INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} tisfc010 ON tisfc010.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND tisfc010.T$OPNO = 10 INNER JOIN {0}.ttirou003{1} tirou003 ON tirou003.T$TANO = tisfc010.T$TANO WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByOrderMaterialRejected
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, ticst001.T$SITM AS SITM, tcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA, MAX(ticst001.T$PONO) AS PONO, tisfc010.T$OPNO AS OPNO, tisfc010.T$TANO AS TANO, tirou003.T$DSCA AS DSCATANO, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tisfc010.T$MCNO AS MCNO, TB1.CANTIDAD AS CANTIDAD, tdipu001.T$OTBP AS OTBP, tccom100.T$NAMA AS NAMA, MAX(tcibd001.T$KLTC) AS KLTC, ticst001.T$CWAR CWAR FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.tticst001{1} ticst001 ON ticst001.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = ticst001.T$SITM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttdipu001{1} tdipu001 ON tdipu001.T$ITEM = ticst001.T$SITM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} tccom100 ON tccom100.T$BPID = tdipu001.T$OTBP INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} tisfc010 ON tisfc010.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND tisfc010.T$OPNO = 10 INNER JOIN {0}.ttirou003{1} tirou003 ON tirou003.T$TANO = tisfc010.T$TANO INNER JOIN( SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, ticst001.T$SITM AS SITM, SUM(ticst001.T$QUCS) AS CANTIDAD FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.tticst001{1} ticst001 ON ticst001.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO --WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$PONO <> 0 AND ticst001.T$QUCS <> 0 AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$PONO <> 0 AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' GROUP BY tisfc001.T$PDNO, ticst001.T$SITM) TB1 ON TRIM(TB1.SITM) = TRIM(ticst001.T$SITM) --WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$PONO <> 0 AND ticst001.T$QUCS > 0 WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$PONO <> 0 AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' GROUP BY tisfc001.T$PDNO, ticst001.T$SITM, tcibd001.T$DSCA, tisfc010.T$OPNO, tisfc010.T$TANO, tirou003.T$DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI, tisfc010.T$MCNO, TB1.CANTIDAD, tdipu001.T$OTBP, tccom100.T$NAMA, ticst001.T$CWAR

operationName.name: findByPdnoMaterialRejected
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, ticst001.T$SITM AS SITM, tcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA, MAX(ticst001.T$PONO) AS PONO, tisfc010.T$OPNO AS OPNO, tisfc010.T$TANO AS TANO, tirou003.T$DSCA AS DSCATANO, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tisfc010.T$MCNO AS MCNO, TB1.CANTIDAD AS CANTIDAD, tdipu001.T$OTBP AS OTBP, tccom100.T$NAMA AS NAMA, MAX(tcibd001.T$KLTC) AS KLTC FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.tticst001{1} ticst001 ON ticst001.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = ticst001.T$SITM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttdipu001{1} tdipu001 ON tdipu001.T$ITEM = ticst001.T$SITM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} tccom100 ON tccom100.T$BPID = tdipu001.T$OTBP INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} tisfc010 ON tisfc010.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND tisfc010.T$OPNO = 10 INNER JOIN {0}.ttirou003{1} tirou003 ON tirou003.T$TANO = tisfc010.T$TANO INNER JOIN( SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, ticst001.T$SITM AS SITM, SUM(ticst001.T$QUCS) AS CANTIDAD FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.tticst001{1} ticst001 ON ticst001.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO --WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$PONO <> 0 AND ticst001.T$QUCS <> 0 AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$PONO <> 0 AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' GROUP BY tisfc001.T$PDNO, ticst001.T$SITM) TB1 ON TRIM(TB1.SITM) = TRIM(ticst001.T$SITM) --WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$PONO <> 0 AND ticst001.T$QUCS > 0 WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$PONO <> 0 AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' GROUP BY tisfc001.T$PDNO, ticst001.T$SITM, tcibd001.T$DSCA, tisfc010.T$OPNO, tisfc010.T$TANO, tirou003.T$DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI, tisfc010.T$MCNO, TB1.CANTIDAD, tdipu001.T$OTBP, tccom100.T$NAMA

operationName.name: findByItemAndPdno

operationName.name: findByPdno
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT ticst001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, ticst001.T$PONO AS PONO, ticst001.T$CWAR AS CWAR, ticst001.T$CLOT AS CLOT, ticst001.T$SITM AS SITM, tcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA FROM {2} ticst001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = ticst001.T$SITM INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} tisfc001 ON tisfc001.T$PDNO = ticst001.T$PDNO WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByPdnoMRB

operationName.name: findByPdnoCosts
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT DISTINCT ticst001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, ticst001.T$PONO AS PONO, ticst001.T$CWAR AS CWAR, ticst001.T$CLOT AS CLOT, ticst001.T$SITM AS SITM, tcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA, --(SELECT CASE WHEN cant_max IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE cant_max END FROM webuser.maxquantity_per_shift{1} WHERE orden = ticst001.T$PDNO AND articulo = ticst001.T$SITM AND maquina = tisfc010.T$MCNO) CANT_MAX, --(SELECT CASE WHEN cant_reg IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE cant_reg END FROM webuser.maxquantity_per_shift{1} WHERE orden = ticst001.T$PDNO AND articulo = ticst001.T$SITM AND maquina = tisfc010.T$MCNO) CANT_REG, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, ticst001.T$QUES AS CANT_EST, (SELECT SUM(ticst0012.T$QUCS) FROM {0}.tticst001{1} ticst0012 WHERE ticst0012.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticst0012.T$SITM = ticst001.T$SITM ) AS ACT_CANT, (SELECT SUM(ticol082.T$QTYT) FROM BAAN.tticol082140 ticol082 WHERE ticol082.T$ORNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticol082.T$PONO = ticst001.T$PONO ) AS ISWH, ticst001.T$ISWH AS ISWH_1, tcibd200.T$OQMF AS OQMF, CASE WHEN ticol080.T$QUNE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ticol080.T$QUNE END AS CANTD, tisfc010.T$MCNO AS MCNO FROM {0}.tticst001{1} ticst001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = ticst001.T$SITM INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd200{1} tcibd200 ON tcibd200.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} tisfc001 ON tisfc001.T$PDNO = ticst001.T$PDNO INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} tisfc010 ON tisfc010.T$PDNO = ticst001.T$PDNO AND tisfc010.T$OPNO = 10 LEFT JOIN {0}.tticol080{1} ticol080 ON ticol080.T$ORNO = ticst001.T$PDNO AND ticol080.T$PONO = ticst001.T$PONO LEFT JOIN webuser.maxquantity_per_shift{1} ON ORDEN = ticst001.T$PDNO AND MAQUINA = tisfc010.T$MCNO --AND ARTICULO = ticst001.T$SITM WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$NNTS = 1 AND ticst001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND TURNO = '[:T$SHIF]' --WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND ticst001.T$NNTS = 1 AND ticst001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' --AND (SELECT TURNO FROM webuser.maxquantity_per_shift{1} WHERE ORDEN = ticst001.T$PDNO AND MAQUINA = tisfc010.T$MCNO GROUP BY TURNO) = '[:T$SHIF]'

operationName.name: findByPdnoMaterialRejected
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT ticst001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, ticst001.T$PONO AS PONO, ticst001.T$CWAR AS CWAR, ticst001.T$CLOT AS CLOT, ticst001.T$SITM AS SITM, tcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA FROM {2} ticst001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = ticst001.T$SITM INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} tisfc001 ON tisfc001.T$PDNO = ticst001.T$PDNO WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7') AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: quantity_reg_order_machine140
operationName.stringSQL: select maquina, articulo, turno,to_char(fecha, 'MMDDYYYY')fecha, sum(cant_reg) cant_reg --Lo que ya se procesó from webuser.quantity_reg_order_machine140 where to_char(fecha, 'MMDDYYYY') = to_char(sysdate, 'MMDDYYYY') and trim(turno) = '[:T$SHIF]' and trim(maquina) = '[:T$MCNO]' and trim(articulo) = '[:T$SITM]' and trim(orden) = '[:T$PDNO]' group by maquina, articulo, turno, to_char(fecha, 'MMDDYYYY')

operationName.name: maxquantity_per_shift140
operationName.stringSQL: select maquina, articulo, turno,to_char(fecha, 'MMDDYYYY') fecha, cant_max, sum(cant_reg) cant_proc -- Lo que tengo pendiente por procesar from webuser.maxquantity_per_shift140 where to_char(fecha, 'MMDDYYYY') = to_char(sysdate, 'MMDDYYYY') and trim(turno) = '[:T$SHIF]' and trim(maquina) = '[:T$MCNO]' and trim(articulo) = '[:T$SITM]' and trim(orden) = '[:T$PDNO]' group by maquina, articulo, turno, to_char(fecha, 'MMDDYYYY'), cant_max

operationName.name: listRecordsByCkot
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$TANO AS TANO, T$DSCA AS DSCA, T$CKOW AS CKOW FROM {2} WHERE T$CKOT = '[:T$CKOT]' ORDER BY T$TANO

operationName.name: listRecords
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$CKOW AS CKOW, T$DSCA AS DSCA FROM {2} WHERE SUBSTR(TRIM(T$DSCA),1,1) IN ('A','P') ORDER BY T$CKOW

operationName.name: listRecordsRSM
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$CKOW AS CKOW, T$DSCA AS DSCA FROM {2} WHERE SUBSTR(TRIM(T$DSCA),1,1) IN ('R','S','M') ORDER BY T$CKOW

operationName.name: findRecordByCwar
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$CWAR AS CWAR, T$DSCA AS DSCA FROM {2} WHERE TRIM(T$CWAR) = TRIM('[:T$CWAR]')

operationName.name: listRecordCwar
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT ttccol003.T$CWAR AS CWAR, T$DSCA AS DSCA FROM {0}.ttccol003{1} ttccol003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} tcmccs003 ON tcmccs003.T$CWAR = ttccol003.T$CWAR WHERE ttccol003.T$WMRB = 1

operationName.name: findRecords
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$CDIS AS CDIS, T$DSCA AS DSCA FROM {2} WHERE T$RSTP = [:T$RSTP] ORDER BY T$DSCA
